banner.title: Car Service near
banner.description: We offer comprehensive car repair services. The workshop deals with various aspects of the vehicle â€“ from mechanical and electrical components to bodywork and interior elements.

Diagnostics.name: Diagnostics
Diagnostics.desc: We use the latest technologies and diagnostic equipment to accurately identify any issues related to electronics, engine, braking system, and other components of your car.

Automotive.name: Automotive
Automotive.desc: Unlike supermarket standards, we prefer durable and reliable solutions. That's why you can trust us. We prefer manufacturers known for good quality and impeccable reputation.

Suspension.name: Suspension
Suspension.desc: Our car suspension services include diagnostics, repairs, replacement of suspension components, and wheel alignment. We provide professional service and use high-quality spare parts.

Electrical.name: Electrical
Electrical.desc: Our automotive electrical services include diagnosis and repair of electrical systems, installation of additional lighting, installation of multimedia systems, and much more. We work efficiently and reliably.

Tire Service.name: Tire Service
Tire Service.desc: Our tire service offers a wide range of services, including tire replacement, tire repairs, and wheel balancing. We have modern equipment and experienced staff who ensure high-quality services.

Oil Service.name: Oil Service
Oil Service.desc: We also offer the possibility of operational service, such as fluid and oil changes, to ensure that your car serves reliably and safely for many years.

brands.text: Our company services a wide range of car brands, offering specialized vehicle maintenance and repair services. We approach our services with a commitment to quality and reliability, ensuring that your car achieves maximum performance and durability.

q3.q: Car repair with OC insurance â€“ how to proceed?
q3.answer: In the event of a collision where the fault lies with another driver, the car can be repaired under the liability insurance of the perpetrator. However, the driver whose car was damaged has the option to choose between two forms of settlement â€“ cash (also called cost) or non-cash. In the case of the former, the driver will receive a sum to cover the damage, the value of which is assessed by an expert. In the case of non-cash settlement, the driver submits his car to the car repair shop, and the shop settles with the insurance company in which the perpetrator has purchased the policy after performing the service.
